body: Thanks to your teeth's strength and quick growth, you are able to chew through nearly any obstacle given sufficient time.
name: Gnawer

sections.body: Damage dealt by your bite attack ignores an amount of hardness equal to 3 plus half your character level. You can spend a full-round action to deal double your bite damage to an unattended, inanimate object.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: If you have the Burrowing Teeth feat, you can burrow through solid stone at a speed of 5 feet per 10 minutes.
sections.name: Special
